WPP doesn't check the purpose of the certificate.
Can you try to do this :
  • Go to 'Tools' -> 'Settings' -> 'Server' Tab
  • Check the checkbox 'Ignore Code-Signing' certificate validation errors'.
  • Try to import the certificate again.
I don't know why, but some certificate issued out by OpenSSL brings problems.
